title: Compensation of commission members
context: ยง50-13 Compensation of commission members. Members of the charter commission shall receive as compensation for their services the sum of $1,000 each, and shall be reimbursed by the county for their necessary expenses incurred in the performance of their duties. [L 1963, c 73, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง143A-14; HRS ยง50-13]
